content: I've been a big fan of this company's products and was especially excited to try this product. Being a busy on the go mom means I really don't have much time for more than 5 minutes treatments. hence I rely on sleep masks, night time treatments etc. this takes 2 minutes that's it and the results are incredible. I use it 2x a week after my shower at night and before I use any face products. In the morning my face is glowing and much smoother!
I love these for travel since they're so convenient. They do tingle but they don't irritate my skin, and they leave my face soft and glowy and ready to absorb a good moisturizer.

I love these pads! I decided to purchase these because of the great reviews. I regularly use a lactic acid and a salicylic acid, so I didn't have much faith that these pads would make a difference, particularly with the large pores on my nose and cheeks. I can't tell you how many products I have used that claim to minimize the appearance of pores with minimal results at best. I have only used these for 3 days now (cut in half to economize) and the results have been amazing. I am thrilled with the results. The only con is the price, but when I find a product that works in ways other products do not - a TRUE Holy Grail - then I will find a way to afford them. You need to try these!!

Slightly dry skin, with cystic acne once a month - yay womanhood! 

I'm actually surprised by how well this works. The pores around my nose are large and always congested looking. Microdermabrasion was the only treatment that worked. I gave this a try one evening, didn't look too closely before going to bed, but when I woke up my skin had the same bright, non-congested look Mirco treatments gave me. Three days later my skin still looks great. This is a holy-grail product if you're looking for a quick at-home fix to tighten pores and reduce congestion. Worth the money. My mind is blown, I've never had an at-home treatment work so well!
My skin is used to acids, so this didn’t do anything, but these would be a good gift idea or for traveling.
title: Dr. Dennis does it again!
Effective and easy
True Holy Grail
Like Microdermabrasion - but at home with wine
if you have pcos this will change your world.

name: Alpha Beta Extra Strength Daily Peel Mini
